channel.title: David Sweet
channel.description: Recent news about David Sweet, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Congrats to the organizers of #dundas #cactusfestival last weekend. Enjoyed speaking with people at my booth Sat & Sun #adfw

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Congrats to the organizers of Festival of Friends in #ancaster this past weekend. Another outstanding event & better weather! #adfw

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: http://t.co/H1pm6pjzB3 Congratulations to local cyclists helping Sea to Sea ride to help end poverty #adfw

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: glad to hear the statement from @MinStevenBlaney on media reports about Bernardo. No plans to move him to med security! heinous crimes

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: honoured to speak to Korean War Vets at HMCS Haida in #HamOnt this afternoon #adfw. They did our country proud. Haida played a key role

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Sicily was a key turning point in WWII and Canadian soldiers helped the fight for freedom there #leonforte #adfw #operationhusky

item.title: Mentioned by CON Media (press release)
item.description:
Harper Government Helps Fight Hate Crime in Hamilton - SYS
HAMILTON, ONTARIO -- (Marketwired) -- 07/09/13 -- Today, David Sweet, Member of Parliament for Ancaster-Dundas-Flamborough-Westdale, announced Government of Canada funding for the Muslim Association of Hamilton, as part of the Communities at Risk: Security Infrastructure Program (SIP). "I'm pleased that another two local ... "Through this funding, our Government is helping to reduce hate crime and make our streets and communities safer," added MP Sweet. "Our Government is helping to ensure that ...
